short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extensions to support Livindi, only needed for Livindi web portal users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Required for co-browsing functionality in the Livindi Portal.  This is only for users of the Livindi portal and requires a Livindi system.
